name: 陳煒朋
objective: 本課程主要介紹在投資上所需要的理論知識與實務觀念，除了風險與報酬以及投資組合的基礎理論知識外，另外還會針對各種有價證券的特性，了解其定價與風險管理的基本觀念，以及其實務交易的方式與市場。
schedule:
1. Overview
2. Investments: Background and Issues
3. Asset Classes and Financial Instruments
4. Securities Markets
5. Mutual Funds
6. Risk and Return
7. Efficient Diversification
8. Capital Asset Pricing and Arbitrage Pricing Theory
9. Midterm Examination (期中考)
10. The Efficient Market Hypothesis and Behavioral Finance
11. Bond Prices and Yields
12. Equity Valuation
13. Securities Analysis
14. Securities Analysis
15. Portfolio Management
16. Futures Markets and Risk Management
17. Options Valuation and Markets
18. Final Examination (期末考)
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam (期中考): 35%
Final Exam (期末考): 35%
Assignment and Quiz (作業與小考): 30%
materials:
Bodie, Z., A. Kane, and A.J. Marcus, (2013), Essentials of Investments, 9/e, McGraw-Hill. (華泰書局)
林哲鵬，2013，投資學，第八版。(華泰書局)
謝劍平，2014，現代投資學，第六版。(智勝書局)
